long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Onpage SEO Content Extension is your ultimate web assistant for SEO analysis and content management, designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your research. Whether you're an SEO expert, content creator, or researcher, WebDraft helps you analyze, organize, and optimize web content with ease.

Key Features:

🔍 People Also Ask (PAA) Expansion: Automatically expand and capture answers from Google's PAA sections. Perfect for research and content gathering.

🗂️ Session Management: Easily create, store, and manage multiple web sessions, making it simple to track and revisit your online work.

📊 Advanced SEO Analysis: Quickly analyze critical SEO elements of any webpage, including headings, meta descriptions, HTML text-to-code ratio, and internal/external links. Gain insights into the SEO structure of pages to optimize your own content.

📝 Topic Modeling & Content Gap Analysis: Discover trending topics for any keyword by analyzing themes discussed by top-ranking websites. Identify content gaps to craft high-value content and stay ahead of the competition.
